channel.title: Help needed with connecting server!
channel.description:
[i][b]Hello everyone, I got a VPS so i dont need to portforward. I did edit in Client.Java 127.0.0.1 in my ip and compile but i cant play with a other computer can someone help me ? Its my first time that i got a VPS and that i create a RuneScapePrivateServer. If someone knows why my server cant be online post here please.
Thanks for reading.
EDIT: Forget to say, i did edit EGUI.java to in my IP.
[/b][/i]

item.title: Help needed with connecting server!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

u need to make a ip from no-ip site, then change it in gui.java in your client.

the reason you can’t connect with 0.0.0.0 on another comp is because your hosting your server files on the comp.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with connecting server!
item.dc:creator: @lolledlmaopenesrofl lolledlmaopenesrofl
item.description:
@lolledlmaopenesrofl wrote:

Dude good help please. Im using the ip from my VPS…

You’re guys does know nothing. I need really help. No Ip Duc ducks. VPS = 24/7

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with connecting server!
item.dc:creator: @Learn Learn
item.description:
@Learn wrote:

[quote=“lolledlmaopenesrofl, post:1, topic:313124”][i][b]Hello everyone,
I got a VPS so i dont need to portforward.
I did edit in Client.Java 127.0.0.1 in my ip and compile but i cant play with a other computer can someone help me ? Its my first time that i got a VPS and that i create a RuneScapePrivateServer. If someone knows why my server cant be online post here please.

Thanks for reading.

EDIT: Forget to say, i did edit EGUI.java to in my IP.

[/b][/i][/quote]

127.0.0.1 is not the good ip go ipchicken.com on ur vps u should use that ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with connecting server!
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Use no-ip duc not VPS. Once you get no-ip create a host and check it off in the little box that opens up. Now change everything from 127.0.0.1 to yourservernamehere.no-ip.biz

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with connecting server!
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

maybe you should try using no~ip duc? dunno if that has somthing to do with it

Read full topic
